title: Opinions thread on the forums
body:
Where do we post when we would like to make a suggestion on improving the game.
Like adding your champ score and LP +/- to your match history page.
Or a box that comes up and ask you if you want to play premade games then you would have the option if you wanted to be abuse by the team because you are the only one not in their premade.

replies.body: That would go in Gameplay and Strategy bro.
